title: Wheres Warwicks Homeguard Animation?
body: I've been playing Warwick for a long time and have always wondered why doesnt he have a homeguard run? I mean it wouldnt be hard just give him his W run for it

replies.body:
Idk, it wouldn't seem right giving him his W animation for just homegaurd... since the point of his running while in W is his primal instincts taking over because of his lust for blood he smells.

Just running out of base kinda ruins that.
